title: ‘My helmet probably saved my life’: Thymen Arensman counts his luck after harrowing Vuelta a España crash
content:
Rising Dutch GC racer loses tooth, receives facial stitches as Ineos Grenadiers reels from tough opening week of racing.

Read the full article at ‘My helmet probably saved my life’: Thymen Arensman counts his luck after harrowing Vuelta a España crash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
